DOC.detailed_description: First , patient recruit accord inclusion criterion exclusion criterion . Second , baseline measurement ( include menstrual frequency , human chorionic gonadotropin ( HCG ) stimulation test , physical examination , trans-abdomen ultrasound uterus ovary , serum level sex hormone steroid ) take . Third , patient receive 32 session acupuncture 16 week , twice week . Last , baseline measurement take soon treatment finish menstrual frequency record 12 week follow-up treatment .
DOC.criteria: 1 ) Unmarried woman age 18 28 year without bear requirement within 4 month . 2 ) Confirmed diagnosis PCOS accord Rotterdam criterion : Oligomenorrhea ( Menstrual cycle > 35 day , le 8 cycle per year ) , amenorrhea ( Menstrual cycle > 90 day ) one follow two criterion ; clinical biochemical hyperandrogenism and/or polycystic ovarian morphology . 1 ) Patients hyperprolactinemia . 2 ) Patients androgens secrete increase abnormal cause adrenal ovarian tumor . 3 ) Patients uncorrected thyroid disease [ thyroidstimulating hormone ( TSH ) < 0.2 milliInternational Unit /milliliter ( mIU/mL ) > 5.5 mIU/mL ] except patient normal TSH past 1 year . 4 ) Suspected Cushing syndrome patient . 5 ) Patients Received Estrogen , Progesterone Oral contraceptives Oral contraceptive hormone medication within past 1 month . It take least one month Eliminate medicine , influence result 6 ) Patients Received medication influence Reproductive function . metabolism within past 2 month ( Anti obesity medications，Anti diabetic medications， traditional Chinese medicine ) . 7 ) Patients take acupuncture treatment within past 3 month . 8 ) Patient unwilling give write consent study .
